title.description: Title or subject of the meeting

calendar_id.description: ID of the calendar where the meeting is scheduled

calendar_type.description: Type of calendar where the meeting is scheduled

meeting_type.description: Type or category of the meeting

recipient_email.description: Email address of the meeting recipient

location.description: Location where the meeting will take place

description.description: Description or details of the meeting

event_id.description: ID of the event associated with the meeting

account_id.description: The ID of the account associated with the meeting

task_id.description: ID of the task associated with the meeting

created_at.description: Timestamp when the meeting was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the meeting was last updated

guests.description: Information about guests invited to the meeting

items.description: List of guests invited to the meeting

attendees.description: Details of attendees participating in the meeting

organizer.description: Indicates if the attendee is the organizer of the meeting

status.description: Status of the attendee for the meeting

status_changed.description: Timestamp of the last status change for the attendee

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the attendee was deleted from the meeting

person.description: Details of the person associated with the meeting

id.description: ID of the person associated with the meeting

_href.description: Hyperlink reference of the person associated with the meeting

cadence.description: Information about the cadence associated with the meeting

id.description: ID of the cadence associated with the meeting

_href.description: Hyperlink reference of the cadence associated with the meeting

step.description: Specific step or stage of the meeting process

id.description: ID of the step associated with the meeting

_href.description: Hyperlink reference of the step associated with the meeting

id.description: ID of the user who booked the meeting

_href.description: Hyperlink reference of the user who booked the meeting

crm_references.description: References to the meeting in CRM

event_source.description: Source of the event related to the meeting

canceled_at.description: Timestamp when the meeting was canceled

all_day.description: Indicates if the meeting is scheduled for the whole day

no_show.description: Indicates if the attendee was a no-show for the meeting

crm_custom_fields.description: Custom fields related to the meeting in CRM

strict_attribution.description: Indicates if the meeting requires strict attribution

i_cal_uid.description: Unique ID for the meeting in iCal format

reschedule_status.description: Status of rescheduling for the meeting

owned_by_meetings_settings.description: Settings related to meetings owned by a user

id.description: ID associated with the owned meetings settings

booked_by_meetings_settings.description: Settings related to the meeting booking

id.description: ID associated with the booked meetings settings
